player.name: Honda Civic
player.desc: Together, we have become a being known as a Nahobino. This new body should allow us to fend off the demons

skills.name: Lunge
skills.desc: Weak Physical attack to 1 foe

skills.name: Mazio
skills.desc: Weak Electric attack to all foes

skills.name: Charge
skills.desc: Increases the damage of the next Strength attack for self

skills.name: Critical Aura
skills.desc: Next Strength-based attack of self will be 100% accurate and guaranteed Critical

rules.name: SMT Demon Crack (NO VIRUS)
rules.description: Any demon, with any combination of moves, is allowed for competative use

actors.name: Slime
actors.desc: A gel-like monster. It is said to be the by-product of a failed summoning. Devoid of its original powers, it is trapped in an incomplete gel form. There are several theories of when the slime was recorded as a monster. They tend to collect shiny objects

baseSkills.name: Dustoma
baseSkills.desc: Chance of inflicting Mirage to 1 foe

baseSkills.name: Poisma
baseSkills.desc: Chance to inflict Poison to 1 foe

skills.name: Lunge
skills.desc: Weak Physical attack to 1 foe

skills.name: Dustoma
skills.desc: Chance of inflicting Mirage to 1 foe

skills.name: Poisma
skills.desc: Chance to inflict Poison to 1 foe

actors.name: Pixie
actors.desc: A small fairy found in southwestern Britain known for their cheerful nature and love of pranks. Their physical appearance changes from region to region, but their personality is always playful and mischievous. A common prank they like to pull is causing humans to wander in circles. However, they are also known to help farmers from time to time and are generally considered good fairies

skills.name: Samarecarm
skills.desc: Revive one ally with full HP

skills.name: Enduring Soul
skills.desc: Endures lethal attack and fully heals HP once in battle

actors.name: Poltergeist
actors.desc: A mischievous spirit known for haunting houses. The name is German in origin, and literally means "noisy ghost." It can do various things, from pulling harmless pranks like making loud noises and moving objects through the air, to dangerous, destructive acts, like starting fires and assaulting people. Poltergeist incidents often occur in homes with children or teenagers, and one theory states that the cause is a child's unstable mentality.

baseSkills.name: Shockbound
baseSkills.desc: 2~5 weak Electric attacks to random foes

baseSkills.name: Matarunda
baseSkills.desc: Lowers Accuracy/Evasion of all allies by 1 rank for 3 turns

baseSkills.name: Dream Needle
baseSkills.desc: Weak Physical attack to 1 foe. Chance of inflicting Sleep

baseSkills.name: Elec Block
baseSkills.desc: Nullifies an Electric attack against all allies once for 1 turn

skills.desc: 2~5 weak Electric attacks to random foes

skills.name: Resist Force
